Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom.
LegalZoom can assist you in preparing and filing a non-provisional patent (Utility Patent) for a total cost of $3,499.00. By coupling LegalZoom's technology with our carefully selected patent firms? experience, we've streamlined the patent application process and developed a new way for inventors to obtain a patent conveniently and affordably. As the inventor, you first flesh out the details of the invention through our online questionnaire, which allows the skilled patent professionals to use their time efficiently and contribute where it makes the greatest difference for your patent application.
Step 1: Obtain Initial Patent Consultation and Professional Patent Drawings - $699
Service in the first step includes:
* Technical patent drawings by a professional illustrator * Expert patent consultation and review by a registered patent attorney or agent * Comprehensive patent search and assessment (Optional for $399)
No-Risk Advantage: If after your consultation you decide not to pursue a patent, there is no obligation to purchase the Patent Filing Package in the second step.
Step 2: Purchase Patent Filing Package - $2,800
Service in the second step includes:
* Expert preparation and drafting of a non-provisional Utility Patent, including 10 claims (up to three independent claims) and five pages of specifications * Preparation of Information Disclosure Statement * Electronic filing of your Utility Patent and payment of initial government filing fees
Enhanced Patent Preparation Option - Add $1,000
This package includes:
* Up to 15 claims prepared by an expert patent professional * Up to eight pages of patent specifications
To get started on your utility patent, click here:
http://www.legalzoom.com/utility-patents/utility-patents-pricing2.html
